actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 924 (relating to commission of Federal felonies with firearms) of title 18 of the United States Code to make applicable to a first conviction under that section the rules for suspended or probationary sentences now applicable to second and subsequent convictions.

summary.text: Provides that whoever: (1) uses a firearm to commit any Federal felony, or (2) carries a firearm unlawfully during the commission of any Federal felony shall not receive a suspended or probationary sentence. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 924(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 924 (relating to commission of Federal felonies with firearms) of title 18 of the United States Code to make applicable to a first conviction under that section the rules for suspended or probationary sentences now applicable to second and subsequent convictions.
